summary: I have handled the multimedia needs for Rapid Repairs for 2 years, including website design and social media
companys: Rapid Repairs has been locally owned since 1999 and performed over 20,000 repair jobs
details: Designed Rapid Repairs website and created a separate mobile version compatible for Apple and Android products.
details1: Track and budget advertising for marketing sources such as Google AdWords, Bing, and Facebook.
details2: Aggressively market our services to National Facility Maintenance companies, and constantly promote our Value Service Price List.
